channel.title: Anti-Flood Is bad plz help
channel.description:
OK so i'm using Acrylicx Client and when im coding or sometimes just whenever people might lag or relog or even just getting a password wrong with make the server reject the person and this is what it says. [code]BANNING HOST IpAddress (flooding) ClientHandler: Rejected (IpAddress):1894 ClientHandler: Rejected (Ipaddress):1895[/code]
If someone can tell me how to fix or remove please help.
